sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormBuilder, FormArray, FormControl, Validators, } from '@angular/forms'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Employee } from 'src/app/models/employee'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit', templateUrl: './edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit.component.css'], }) export class EditComponent implements OnInit { constructor( private signinAuth: AuthService, private router: Router, private Router: ActivatedRoute ) {} ngOnInit(): void { const id = this.Router.snapshot.params.id; this.signinAuth.getEmployeebyid(id).subscribe((data: any) => { this.addForm.patchValue({ id: data.id, name: data.name, depid: data.depId, cnic: data.cnic, age: data.age, salary: data.salary, }); }); } addForm = new FormGroup({ id: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), name: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(3), Validators.maxLength(14), ]), depid: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), cnic: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(13), Validators.maxLength(13), ]), age: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(2), Validators.maxLength(2), ]), salary: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(5), Validators.maxLength(6), ]), }); isUserValid: boolean = false; Submitted() { const employee: Employee = { id: this.addForm.get('id')?.value, name: this.addForm.get('name')?.value, age: this.addForm.get('age')?.value, salary: this.addForm.get('salary')?.value, cnic: this.addForm.get('cnic')?.value, depId: this.addForm.get('depid')?.value, }; this.signinAuth.addEmployee(employee).subscribe((resp: any[]) => { if (resp.length === 0) { this.isUserValid = false; alert('Unsuccessful'); } else { this.router.navigate(['pages/home']); } }); } get id(): FormControl { return this.addForm.get('id') as FormControl; } get name(): FormControl { return this.addForm.get('name') as FormControl; } get depid(): FormControl { return this.addForm.get('depid') as FormControl; } get cnic(): FormControl { return this.addForm.get('cnic') as FormControl; } get age(): FormControl { return this.addForm.get('age') as FormControl; } get salary(): FormControl { return this.addForm.get('salary') as FormControl; } }

Edit

Name is required
Name should be at least 6 and as long as 14 characters long
Depid is required
Cnic is required
Cnic should be 14 characters long
Age is required
Age should be between 18 to 60
Salary is required
Salary should be have 5 to 6 numbers
